description: Do you need inspiration to live everyday to the fullest? By providing your birthday Alexa will tell you what percentage of your life you have lived in and what you have left.
exampleInteractions: Alexa tell my hourglass my birthday is March Seventeenth Nineteen Seventy One
Alexa ask my hourglass how much longer should I expect to live
Alexa ask my hourglass what percentage have I lived
name: Hourglass
shortDescription: Hourglass will tell you based on your birthday and averages based on your gender, what percentage you have lived and how long you have left.
